thread.title: Motorcyclist dies from crash with car in Gresham
thread.title_full: Motorcyclist dies from crash with car in Gresham

author: Jenna Deml
title: Motorcyclist dies from crash with car in Gresham
text:
by: Jenna Deml
Posted: Jun 13, 2024 / 01:48 PM PDT
Updated: Jun 13, 2024 / 01:50 PM PDT
A Gresham police car at the scene of a crime, October 7, 2023 (KOIN, file) Officials say the motorcyclist died at a local hospital shortly after the crash.
by: Jenna Deml
Posted: Jun 13, 2024 / 01:48 PM PDT
Updated: Jun 13, 2024 / 01:50 PM PDT
SHARE
PORTLAND, Ore. ( KOIN ) â€” A motorcyclist has died from injuries sustained in a crash involving a vehicle in Gresham early Wednesday evening, police said.
At around 5:15 p.m., officers and emergency crews responded to a report of the crash at Northwest Birdsdale Avenue north of Division Street.
Portland officials discuss return of Rapid Response Team On arrival, officials said the motorcyclist was injured, but alert and communicating with EMS responders. The motorcyclist was then taken to a hospital for further treatment.
The driver of the vehicle involved stayed at the scene and cooperated with the investigation, officials say.
However, shortly before 8 p.m., authorities say the motorcyclist died in the hospital.
Authorities say the investigation is ongoing and the cause of the crash has not been released at this time.
Anyone with further information on this crash is encouraged to contact Gresham police.
